page.title: 01ABERDEEN: N.E. OF THE CITY.
page.content:
ABERDEEN: THE N.E. OF THE CITY.
The N.E. of Aberdeen includes a variety of private and council housing as well as Old Aberdeen, the University and the College of Education. There is a considerable amount of recreational land within the area.
The East of the block is almost entirely coast bordered by a promenade and the Links Golf Course.
Moving inland we find Aberdeen Football Club's Pittodrie Stadium and a large number of Victorian tenement buildings.
In the middle of the block is the post-war Tillydrone council estate, Old Aberdeen, the University
